definition: to cast/to send/to throw oneself (into the river etc)/to seek refuge/to place oneself into the hands of
"hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
bamboo or wooden spear/Kangxi radical 79, occurring in 段, 毅, 殺 etc
to throw into/to put into/to throw oneself into/to participate in/to invest in/absorbed/engrossed
complaint/to complain/to register a complaint (esp. as a customer)
to put into production/to put into operation
to input/to throw in/to unload/to put into circulation
to throw one's energies (into an activity)/to invest one's emotions (in sth)/to bet/betting

sentences.english: A compound slide with tool post sits between them.
sentences.chinese: 复合投影片与工具后坐在他们之间。

sentences.english: She has contributed to literary magazines.
sentences.chinese: 她给几家文学刊物投了稿。

sentences.english: He's trying to make a three-point shot.
sentences.chinese: 他正试著要投一个三分球。

sentences.english: Pick up the receive and drop a coin into the slot.
sentences.chinese: 拿起电话筒，然后投一枚硬币到投币孔里去。

sentences.english: All our household goods are insured against accidental damage.
sentences.chinese: 我家所有的物品都投了意外损失险。

sentences.english: But the 38-year-old right-hander hasn't completely come to terms with the decision.
sentences.chinese: 但这位38岁的右投并未完全在此决定上妥协。

sentences.english: Then I cast all the appendages and the sail.
sentences.chinese: 那么，我投的所有附件和船帆。

sentences.english: The slatted window-shade casts a film noir shadow on her.
sentences.chinese: 百叶窗帘在她身上投下朦胧的黑色阴影。

sentences.english: They dropped three bombs without hitting any of the ships .
sentences.chinese: 他们投下三颗炸弹，但一艘船也没炸着。

sentences.english: The trial showed that lactating goats can be feeded with whole corn or coarsely cracked corn instead of deeply processed corn.
sentences.chinese: 说明对泌乳羊可采用整粒或粗粉的形式投喂玉米。

sentences.english: She shot an admonitory glance at her son .
sentences.chinese: 她向儿子投去责备的目光。

sentences.english: The U.S. voted against the resolution; Russia abstained.
sentences.chinese: 美国投否决票，俄罗斯弃权。

sentences.english: Throw a stone into still water and watch the ripples spread in rings .
sentences.chinese: 投一块石头到静止的水里，看涟漪荡漾成圈。

sentences.english: And how many would vote 'guilty', what they did was morally wrong?
sentences.chinese: 多少会投“有罪“，认为道德上是不允许的？

sentences.english: Turns out I paid the bus driver $200.
sentences.chinese: 卧槽我投了200刀给公交车么。

definition: to hit the target with one's throw/(basketball) to score
everyone present/the whole audience/across-the-board/unanimously/whole duration (of a competition or match)
(military) line of troops encircling an enemy position/(telephony) outside line/(basketball) outside the three-point line
the feel (of sth touched with the hand)/(textiles) handle
to dispose of/to spend (money)/to undertake a task
